Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding Katara, Aang, and the Avatar?
Options:
A. Aang is the Avatar, capable of manipulating all four elements.
B. Katara has defeated Aang in a battle.
C. Aang must master all elements to fulfill his role as the Avatar.
D. Katara is a waterbender who supports Aang in his journey.
Correct Answer: Aang is the Avatar, capable of manipulating all four elements. Katara is a waterbender who supports Aang in his journey.
